title: Mobile Blended Learning-Based Elementary Science Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment using mobile devices and online platforms for 30-something professionals requiring job-linked science knowledge acquisition

learning_goals: Learners explain core elementary science concepts (energy, ecosystems, changes in matter) with over 80% accuracy using mobile devices and an LMS.
Learners complete collaborative science experiment design projects with peers using blended learning tools.
Learners establish self-directed learning plans based on weekly learning logs and achieve over 90% attendance.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
